5A44590A.Line1.8DD12: She took me to an ancient battlefield, where thousands of our kind died at the hands of angel and demon. “Never again will we suffer so,” she proclaimed.

F438D28C.Line3.8DD12: And in her eyes I saw a new world, a paradise where we will live free from the tyranny of the Heavens and Hell. Ours, if we have the strength to make it so.
